a.title: Director of Assessment and Program Improvement

li.a: Director of Assessment and Program Improvement

span.span: Click here to view our 4/13/2020 Board Meeting here at 12:00 noon. UPDATE 4/3/2020: Per Governor Holcomb and the Indiana Dept of Education ALL Indiana schools will finish the 19-20 school year under Remote Learning. We will provide an update by 5 pm tomorrow (Friday April 3) on continued education services for Salem Community Schools. Please submit any questions here: https://bit.ly/salemfaq
span.br: If you would like to sign up for meal distribution for the week of April 20 24, please visit: https://bit.ly/scsmeals5

div.div: Attention All Salem Schools Families: With guidance from the offices of the Governor, Indiana State and Washington County Departments of Health, Salem Schools will be closed beginning Monday March 16th. Click View More to see important information.

a.title: Salem Schools Parent and Student Portal

div.p: Salem Community Schools wants to welcome you to our new web space for the SCS community. Please check back often for more updates and new content.
